original:
Colombian art has been significantly influenced by prominent figures such as Pablo Picasso and Graham Sutherland. In contemporary times, artists like Fernando Botero and Omar Rayo have gained international recognition for their contributions to the art scene.


In the 21st century, Colombian artists have increasingly explored the intersection of new media and traditional crafts. Their work often reflects on the Colombian conflict and it
